channel.title: Foxs News Involved in Wikipedia Entry Editing
channel.description:
Not only do they skew their own news... now put their malicious slant on Wikipedia entries.
http://www.geeksaresexy.net/2007/08/14/fox-news-changes-wikipedia-to-smear-rivals-olbermann-and-franken-comprehensive-list-of-changes
Face it. You are being spoonfed shit by CNN and Fox straight from their asses. Boycott them. Reuters.com ftw.
